ratings.comment: One of the finest teachers and learners of marketing strategy and marketing channels. Shame that he is now no more at UW. Great grasp on literature. Extremely kind and helpful.
It's a shame he is leaving the WSoB. He is a FABULOUS professor

Kersi has phenomenal talent for connecting the classroom to learn material. He not only is able to engage discussion in class, but also expects students to challenge each others' thoughts. He also comes to class supremely prepared. I feel fortunate to have taken his class and think anyone should take the opportunity to learn from him.

Kersi is an awesome guy who truly has his students' best interest in mind. He makes a genuine effort to know everyone's names right away and does a great job engaging us in his lectures every time. The case studies are HARD but he will go out of his way to help you with them. Not the easiest class but you will take a lot away from it.

Kersi is a great professor who genuinely cares about students. He makes the material very interesting and the lectures are very interactive and engaging. He walked in the first day already knowing students names from courses@uw.  He really cares and I learned a ton this semester!  I would recommend this class to every marketing major!
Best Business School professor I have had! So helpful and learned so much.  Not like some professors who get on their soapbox and lecture, he made class fun but learned so much!
